pkgmetadata.longdescription: # RugUniversal library for fetching Stock and ETF data from the internet - mostly unofficialAPIs - no limits, more free data.(for Cryptocurrency alternative see [karpet](https://github.com/im-n1/karpet))* [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/rug/)* [documentation](https://rug.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) ![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/rug/badge/?version=latest)* [changelog](./CHANGELOG.md)
